attributes.action: limit the period of time a person can claim benefits in his/her life to 3 years (apart from when the claim is based on a medical condition or regarding pensions).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Apart from those claiming benefits for medical reasons and pensioners, all other people should only be able to claim benefits for a period of three years in their lifetime. So, from the age of 18 to 65, one cannot claim benefit for any reason/s (apart those unable to work for medical conditions) for more than 3 years.
